function.name: update_appointment_confirmation
function.description: Updates the appointment confirmation status after speaking with the customer. Call this after the customer responds whether they can attend the appointment or not.

contactId.description: The GoHighLevel contact ID (provided in the call metadata)

appointmentId.description: The appointment ID (provided in the call metadata)

status.description: The confirmation status: 'confirmed' if customer confirms they can attend, 'cancelled' if they cannot attend, 'reschedule' if they want a different time, 'no_answer' if customer didn't give a clear response

notes.description: Optional notes about the conversation or customer's specific requests (e.g., 'Customer asked to be called back in 30 minutes', 'Customer needs to confirm with spouse first')
